about_the_game:
Celebrate 420 with new cosmetic items for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! Featuring fresh outfit items for your New Kid.

Includes:
  • Hat: Reggae Beanie
  • Beard: The Woodsman
  • Beard: Trimmed
  • Tunic: Tie-Dye
  • Tunic: 100% Hemp Tegridy T-shirt

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depiction of fart clouds, feces, urine and other gross ways to use against enemies.
